title:
Characteristic integrals and general solution of the
  Ferapontov-Shabat-Yamilov lattice
abstract:
For the finite (non-periodic) systems obtained from a lattice introduced by
Ferapontov and independently by Shabat and Yamilov, we present a
quadrature-free general solution and a recurrent formula for the characteristic
integrals. The derivation of these formulae relies on the underlying
determinantal equations. We illustrate the results using a two-component
system.
subjects: Nonlinear Sciences/Exactly Solvable and Integrable Systems
